title: Os android schema
description: This is a schema which contains information about customer's Android operation system data (os version, device name, device token)

version.title: Version
version.description: Describes what version of android os the customer is using

sdk.title: Sdk
sdk.description: Displays what version of SDK customer is using

nfc.title: Nfc
nfc.description: Contains information about the NFC support on customer`s device
